macro.name: PORT
macro.description: Serial COM port of the ITC used to control the 3He Insert.

macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: SORB_SENSOR
macro.description: The sensor corresponding to the sorb.

macro.name: HE3POTHI_SENSOR
macro.description: The sensor corresponding to the the He3 Pot at high temperatures.

macro.name: 1KPOTHE3POTLO_SENSOR
macro.description: The corresponding to the the 1K Pot/He3 Pot at low temperatures.

macro.name: SORB_CHANNEL
macro.description: The channel to use when controlling the sorb.

macro.name: HE3POTHI_CHANNEL
macro.description: The channel to use when controlling the He3Pot at high temperatures.

macro.name: 1KPOTHE3POTLO_CHANNEL
macro.description: The channel to use when controlling the 1K Pot/He3Pot at low temperatures.

macro.name: MAX_TEMP_FOR_HE3_COOLING
macro.description: The temperature below which He3 cooling is to be used.

macro.name: MAX_OPERATING_TEMP_FOR_HELIOX
macro.description: The maximum temperature at which the heliox can be operated at.

macro.name: DEFAULT_POST_CONDENSE_TEMP_SETPOINT
macro.description: The default temperature setpoint to set just after a recondense
